attributes.action: INCREASE GOVERNMENT FUNDING INTO MOTORCYCLE SAFETY RESEARCH AND ASSOCIATED TECHNOLOGIES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Statistics have shown that excessive speed is linked to only a relatively small percentage of motorcycle accidents leading to death or serious injury. However speeding tends to be the main focus of campaign groups and police. This petition requests the  Government to increase investment in motorcycle safety research, associated safety improvement schemes and technologies.

rejection.details: Please address your excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
